description: A request to start an asynchronous job to query a user's download list.  Set inlcudeAvailableFiles=true to get and AvailableFilesResonse.  Set inlcudeStatistics=true to get DownloadListStatistics.

inlcudeAvailableFiles.description: Optional.  When included and set to true, the results will include AvailableFilesResonse about the files on the user's download list.

availableFilesRequest.description: When inlcudeAvailableFiles=true, use this request to control sorting and/or pagination of the AvailableFilesResonse.

inlcudeStatistics.description: Optional.  When included and set to true, the results will include DownloadListStatistics about the files on the user's download list.

includeActionRequired.description: Optional.  When included and set to true, the results will include DownloadListStatistics about the files on the user's download list.
